doc.title: More Dates for Kay
doc.plot: Kay, a boy-crazy high school student, devotes her entire life to finding dates. She tries every trick she can to get boys to take her out, from pretendng that she cars about sports and cars to getting herself put on cleanup committees to meet boys. According to this film, this is way girls really SHOULD be--that without a man to have around, their lives really aren't worth anything.
